about.p1: The Navi R3 isn't just a mouse; it's a platform. Built around a custom PCB with the Nordic nRF52820 MCU and PMW3360 sensor, it delivers pro-grade wireless performance with zero compromises.
about.p2: Every part of the Navi R3 is open source. From the firmware to the 3D printable shell files, you have complete access to modify, improve, and make it your own.

hero.subtitle: Your mouse. Your modules. Your control.
hero.lead: The first fully modular, open-source gaming mouse designed for creators and pros.

footer.description: An open-hardware initiative to create the ultimate modular gaming mouse. Designed by the community, for the community.

modules.title: A Modular Architecture
modules.subtitle: Add features. Change features. Create new ones.
modules.intro_prefix: The Navi R3 features dedicated extension ports assigned to pins
modules.intro_suffix: These aren't just connectors; they're your gateway to hardware innovation.

hardware.title: Inside the Navi R3
hardware.subtitle: Professional grade components meet accessible engineering.

components.title: Nordic nRF52820
components.description: The brain of the operation. Handles Bluetooth 5.4, 2.4GHz wireless, and USB connectivity with incredible efficiency.

components.title: PixArt PMW3360
components.description: Flawless 1:1 tracking. No acceleration, no smoothing, just raw precision for competitive gaming.

components.title: Power Management
components.description: Advanced Li-ion charging with MCP73833 and efficient 5V boost conversion for stable module power.
